cnbc.title: 'We need the smartest people': Nvidia, OpenAI CEOs react to Trump's H-1B visa fee
cnbc.summary: "We want all the brightest minds to come to the U.S. and remember immigration is the foundation of the American Dream," Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said Monday.

cnbc.title: Supreme Court lets Trump fire FTC's Slaughter for now
cnbc.summary: The Supreme Court allowed President Donald Trump to remove Rebecca Slaughter as a member of the Federal Trade Commission while the justices consider her case.

cnbc.title: Disney says 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' will return to ABC on Tuesday
cnbc.summary: ABC had pulled Kimmel's show after he made comments linking the alleged killer of conservative activist Charlie Kirk to President Donald Trump's MAGA movement.

cnbc.title: Trump admin draws unproven link between autism and Tylenol ingredient use during pregnancy
cnbc.summary: Officials warned pregnant women against using acetaminophen unless they have a fever, and touted a lesser-known drug as a potential treatment for autism.

cnbc.title: Trump to meet top Democrats as their health care demands fuel government shutdown risk
cnbc.summary: Sen. Chuck Schumer urged President Donald Trump to meet with congressional Democratic leaders to negotiate a way out of the government funding stalemate.

cnbc.title: Fed Governor Stephen Miran pushes case for central bank to slash key interest rate
cnbc.summary: Miran outlined the reasons why he thinks the Fed's benchmark interest rate is far too high and should be lowered aggressively.

cnbc.title: India feels the sting as Trump slaps $100,000 fee on H-1B visas
cnbc.summary: Investors shed shares of IT outsourcing firms of all sizes, including Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Wipro, HCL Technologies and Tata Consultancy Services.

cnbc.title: India is betting $18 billion to build a chip powerhouse. Here’s what it means
cnbc.summary: India dreams of being self-sufficient in terms of semiconductors has seen it invest heavily to attract global chip companies. But success has been uneven.

cnbc.title: Here's everything Trump is changing with H-1B visas
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump raised the fee for an H-1B visa to $100,000 on Friday, leaving companies scrambling to respond.

cnbc.title: NYC mayor candidate Mamdani withdraws from ABC town hall over Jimmy Kimmel suspension
cnbc.summary: A slew of Academy Award winners and other Hollywood celebrities signed a letter organized by the ACLU backing Jimmy Kimmel.
